title: Lease Accounting Manager
summary: This is an exciting opportunity to work in a fast-paced environment and help shape the Company’s future. Get ready for your perfect job, one that encourages you to think analytically and work collaboratively with Apple business partners across the world.
description: The Lease Accounting Manager will be responsible for accurate reporting of leases associated with the real estate portfolio, 1600+, around the world for P&L and balance sheet. In this role, the manager will have a close partnership with Corporate and Retail Real Estate, and Global Business Solution (GBS) teams to ensure accurate lease accounting worldwide in accordance with ASC 842.
preferred_qualifications:
SOX compliance experience is preferred
Detailed knowledge of New Lease Accounting (ASC 842)
In-depth understanding and application of the new lease accounting criteria
Drive resolution on open lease accounting problems across the business
Be a self-starter with the ability to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment
Build effective business partnerships and be an excellent team player
Strong performance in a fast-paced, innovative environment
Excellent analytical and Excel modeling skills
Effective written, verbal and presentation skills; with ability to present to all levels within the organization.
System implementation and project and process improvement experience is an advantage
Experience with enterprise software systems and databases a plus (e.g., SAP and Tririga).
Strong understanding of US GAAP
CPA Preferred
